PackageOracle.name: DA_CONTACT_PER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CONTACT_PER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.46.373983000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_per_desc IN VARCHAR2
,contact_per_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,contact_per_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_contact_per;

body.name: DA_CONTACT_PER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CONTACT_PER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.46.383983000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_per_desc IN VARCHAR2
,contact_per_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,contact_per_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_contact_per.add, parms=' || contact_per_cd || '|' || contact_per_desc || '|' || contact_per_start_dttm || '|' || contact_per_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_contact_per a
(
a.contact_per_cd
,a.contact_per_desc
,a.contact_per_start_dttm
,a.contact_per_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.contact_per_cd
,add.contact_per_desc
,add.contact_per_start_dttm
,add.contact_per_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_contact_per.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,contact_per_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_contact_per.del, parms=' || contact_per_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_contact_per a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.contact_per_cd = del.contact_per_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_contact_per.del');

END del;

END da_contact_per;
